trans-unit.source: Represents a member that can be declared in any <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StructuralType" />.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un membro che può essere dichiarato in qualsiasi oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StructuralType" />.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmMember> class is a base class for <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmProperty>, <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.NavigationProperty>, and <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipEndMember>.
trans-unit.target: Una classe <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmMember> è una classe base per <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmProperty>, <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.NavigationProperty> e <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.RelationshipEndMember>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmMember> class represents a member that can be declared in any <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StructuralType>.
trans-unit.target: La classe <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.EdmMember> rappresenta un membro che può essere dichiarato in qualsiasi oggetto <xref:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StructuralType>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about members, see [Structural Types (Metadata)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c0c54fe0-e0ba-4e1d-8572-dfd2fbf788fa).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui membri, vedere [tipi strutturali (metadati)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c0c54fe0-e0ba-4e1d-8572-dfd2fbf788fa).

trans-unit.source: Gets the type on which this member is declared.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il tipo in cui è dichiarato il membro.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StructuralType" /> object that represents the type on which this member is declared.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.StructuralType" /> che rappresenta il tipo in cui è dichiarato il membro.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of this member.
Returns the name of this member.
Gets the instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage" /> class that contains both the type of the member and facets for the type.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage" /> che contiene il tipo del membro e i facet per il tipo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage" /> object that contains both the type of the member and facets for the type.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.Metadata.Edm.TypeUsage" /> che contiene il tipo del membro e i facet per il tipo.
